name: CUSTOM Multi Columns Video
liquid_code:
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@9/swiper-bundle.min.css"/>

{%- liquid
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  
  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_letter = section.settings.heading_letter
  assign heading_mt = section.settings.heading_mt
  assign heading_mb = section.settings.heading_mb
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  
  assign text = section.settings.text
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_letter = section.settings.text_letter
  assign text_align = section.settings.text_align
  
  assign numbers = section.settings.numbers
  assign column_mt = section.settings.column_mt
  assign column_direction = section.settings.column_direction
  assign column_gap = section.settings.column_gap
  assign column_gap_mobile = section.settings.column_gap_mobile
  assign column_radius = section.settings.column_radius
  assign column_bg_color = section.settings.column_bg_color
  assign column_padding_horizontal = section.settings.column_padding_horizontal
  assign column_padding_top = section.settings.column_padding_top
  assign column_padding_bottom = section.settings.column_padding_bottom
  assign column_row = section.settings.column_row
  assign column_row_mobile = section.settings.column_row_mobile
  
  assign column_heading_size = section.settings.column_heading_size
  assign column_heading_color = section.settings.column_heading_color
  assign column_heading_font = section.settings.column_heading_font
  assign column_heading_height = section.settings.column_heading_height
  assign column_heading_letter = section.settings.column_heading_letter
  assign column_heading_mt = section.settings.column_heading_mt
  
  assign column_text_size = section.settings.column_text_size
  assign column_text_color = section.settings.column_text_color
  assign column_text_font = section.settings.column_text_font
  assign column_text_height = section.settings.column_text_height
  assign column_text_letter = section.settings.column_text_letter
  assign column_text_mt = section.settings.column_text_mt
  
  assign column_link_size = section.settings.column_link_size
  assign column_link_color = section.settings.column_link_color
  assign column_link_hover_color = section.settings.column_link_hover_color
  assign column_link_font = section.settings.column_link_font
  assign column_link_height = section.settings.column_link_height
  assign column_link_letter = section.settings.column_link_letter
  assign column_link_bg_color = section.settings.column_link_bg_color
  assign column_link_bg_hover_color = section.settings.column_link_bg_hover_color
  assign column_link_mt = section.settings.column_link_mt
  assign column_link_padding_vertical = section.settings.column_link_padding_vertical
  assign column_link_padding_horizontal = section.settings.column_link_padding_horizontal
  assign column_link_style = section.settings.column_link_style
  assign column_link_radius = section.settings.column_link_radius
  assign column_link_width = section.settings.column_link_width
  assign column_link_max = section.settings.column_link_max

  assign column_number_size = section.settings.column_number_size
  assign column_number_color = section.settings.column_number_color
  assign column_number_font = section.settings.column_number_font
  assign column_number_bg_color = section.settings.column_number_bg_color

  assign column_image_max = section.settings.column_image_max
  assign column_image_max_mobile = section.settings.column_image_max_mobile
  assign column_image_radius = section.settings.column_image_radius

  assign column_video_radius = section.settings.column_video_radius
  assign column_video_height_mobile = section.settings.column_video_height_mobile
  assign column_video_height = section.settings.column_video_height

  assign column_style = section.settings.column_style
  assign column_style_mobile = section.settings.column_style_mobile

  assign autoplay = section.settings.autoplay
  assign autoplay_speed = section.settings.autoplay_speed

  assign nav_btn_bg = section.settings.nav_btn_bg
  assign nav_btn_hover_bg = section.settings.nav_btn_hover_bg
  assign nav_border = section.settings.nav_border
  assign nav_border_hover = section.settings.nav_border_hover
  assign nav_icon = section.settings.nav_icon
  assign nav_hover_icon = section.settings.nav_hover_icon
  assign nav_size = section.settings.nav_size
  assign nav_size_mobile = section.settings.nav_size_mobile
  
  assign hide_nav = section.settings.hide_nav

  if column_direction == 'center'
    assign justify = 'center'
  elsif column_direction == 'left'
    assign justify = 'start'
  else
    assign justify = 'end'
  endif

  if column_row == '2'
    assign column_maxwidth = 46
  elsif column_row == '3'
    assign column_maxwidth = 29
  elsif column_row == '4'
    assign column_maxwidth = 21
  endif

  if column_row_mobile == '1'
    assign column_maxwidth_mobile = 100
  elsif column_row_mobile == '2'
    assign column_maxwidth_mobile = 45
  elsif column_row_mobile == '3'
    assign column_maxwidth_mobile = 29
  elsif column_row_mobile == '4'
    assign column_maxwidth_mobile = 21
  endif

  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ column_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ column_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ column_link_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ column_number_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .multicolumns-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ heading_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0  }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ heading_mb | times: 0.75 | round: 0  }}px;
    font-size: {{ heading_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ heading_letter }}px;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ heading_align }};
  }
  
  .multicolumns-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ text_letter }}px;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ text_align }};
  }
  
  .multicolumns-items-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ column_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0  }}px;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: {{ justify }};
    align-items: stretch;
    gap: {{ column_gap_mobile }}px;
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ column_radius | times: 0.75 | round: 0}}px !important;
    background-color: {{ column_bg_color }} !important;
    padding-top: {{ column_padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
    padding-bottom: {{ column_padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
    padding-left: {{ column_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
    padding-right: {{ column_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .multicolumns-items-{{ section.id }} .multicolumns-item-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 0 1 {{ column_maxwidth_mobile }}% !important;
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: {{ column_number_bg_color }};
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }} p {
    font-size: {{ column_number_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ column_number_color }};
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: {{ column_image_max_mobile }}px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-radius: {{ column_image_radius | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }} img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: {{ column_image_radius | times: 0.75 | round: 0}}px;
  }

  .multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }} .placeholder {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 0;
    border-radius: {{ column_video_radius | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    background-color: #CABBB6;
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-video-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-radius: {{ column_video_radius }}px;
  }

  .multicolumns-item-video-{{ section.id }} video {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: {{ column_video_height_mobile }}px;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 0;
    border-radius: {{ column_video_radius }}px;
    background-color: #CABBB6;
  }

  .multicolumns-item-video-{{ section.id }} .placeholder {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 0;
    border-radius: {{ column_video_radius | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    background-color: #CABBB6;
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ column_heading_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    font-size: {{ column_heading_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ column_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ column_heading_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ column_heading_letter }}px;
    text-align: {{ column_direction }};
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ column_text_mt }}px;
    font-size: {{ column_text_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ column_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ column_text_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ column_text_letter }}px;
    text-align: {{ column_direction }};
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ column_link_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    font-size: {{ column_link_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ column_link_color }};
    line-height: {{ column_link_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ column_link_letter }}px;
    text-align: {{ column_direction }};
    transition: all 0.1s ease-in 0s;
    text-decoration: none;
  }
  
  .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.1s ease-in 0s;
    color: {{ column_link_hover_color }};
  }

  .multicolumns-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-top: {{ column_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0  }}px;
    display: none;
    position: relative;
  }

  .multicolumns-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
  .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute !important;
    top: 50% !important;
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    z-index: 3;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 1px solid {{ nav_border }} !important;
    width: {{ nav_size_mobile }}px !important;
    height: {{ nav_size_mobile }}px !important;
    background: {{ nav_btn_bg }} !important;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 5px !important;
  }
  .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 5px !important;
  }

  .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
  }

  .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: {{ nav_size_mobile | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
    height: {{ nav_size_mobile | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
  }

  .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ nav_icon }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
  
  .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    margin-left: -2px;
  }

  .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover,
  .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    border: 1px solid {{ nav_border_hover }} !important;
    background: {{ nav_btn_hover_bg }} !important;
  }

  .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ nav_hover_icon }} !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 768px) {

  .multicolumns-item-video-{{ section.id }} .placeholder {
    border-radius: {{ column_video_radius }}px;
  }

  .multicolumns-item-video-{{ section.id }} video {
    height: {{ column_video_height }}px;
  }

  .multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }} .placeholder {
    border-radius: {{ column_video_radius }}px;
  }

  .multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }} img {
    border-radius: {{ column_image_radius }}px;
  }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
      margin-top: {{ heading_mt }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ heading_mb }}px;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-items-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ column_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ column_gap }}px;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-item-{{ section.id }} {
      border-radius: {{ column_radius }}px !important;
      padding-top: {{ column_padding_top }}px !important;
      padding-bottom: {{ column_padding_bottom }}px !important;
      padding-left: {{ column_padding_horizontal }}px !important;
      padding-right: {{ column_padding_horizontal }}px !important;
    }

    .multicolumns-items-{{ section.id }} .multicolumns-item-{{ section.id }} {
      flex: 0 1 {{ column_maxwidth }}% !important;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }} {
      height: {{section.settings.column_image_height}}px;
      max-width: {{ column_image_max }}px;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-item-title-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ column_heading_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ column_heading_size }}px;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-item-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ column_text_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ column_text_size }}px;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ column_link_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ column_link_size }}px;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }} p {
      font-size: {{ column_number_size }}px;
    }

    .multicolumns-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: 0;
      margin-right: 0 
      margin-top: {{ column_mt }}px;
    }

    .multicolumns-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      padding-left: 0 !important;
      padding-right: 0 !important;
    }

    .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
    .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ nav_size }}px !important;
      height: {{ nav_size }}px !important;
    }

    .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
      height: {{ nav_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
      width: {{ nav_size | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
    }
  }
  @media(max-width: 500px) {
    .multicolumns-title-{{ section.id }},
    .multicolumns-text-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px 20px;
    }
  }
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if section.settings.heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.text_custom %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if column_direction == 'center' %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-right: auto;
    }
    .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-right: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif column_direction == 'right' %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
    }
    .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.column_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-item-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ column_heading_font.family }};
      font-weight: {{ column_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ column_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.column_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-item-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ column_text_font.family }};
      font-weight: {{ column_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ column_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.column_link_custom %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ column_link_font.family }};
      font-weight: {{ column_link_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ column_link_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.column_number_custom %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }} p {
      font-family: {{ column_number_font.family }};
      font-weight: {{ column_number_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ column_number_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if column_link_style == "button" %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }} {
      background-color: {{ column_link_bg_color }};
      padding: {{ column_link_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ column_link_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      border-radius: {{ column_link_radius | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    }
    
    .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      color: {{ column_link_color }};
      background-color: {{ column_link_bg_hover_color }};
    }
    
    @media(min-width:768px) {
      .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }} {
        padding: {{ column_link_padding_vertical }}px {{ column_link_padding_horizontal }}px;
        border-radius: {{ column_link_radius }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if column_link_width == "regular" %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: {{ column_link_max }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if column_style == "slider" or column_style_mobile == "slider" %}
  <style>
    {% if column_style_mobile == "slider" %}
      .multicolumns-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
        display: block;
      }
      .multicolumns-items-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    {% endif %}
    @media(min-width: 768px) {
      {% if column_style == "slider" %}
        .multicolumns-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
          display: block;
        }
        .multicolumns-items-{{ section.id }} {
          display: none;
        }
      {% else %}
        .multicolumns-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
          display: none;
        }
        .multicolumns-items-{{ section.id }} {
          display: flex;
        }
      {% endif %}
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if hide_nav %}
  <style>
    .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
    .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
    @media(min-width: 768px) {
      .multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }},
      .multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} multicolumns-video-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
  <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
    
        {% if heading != blank %}
          <h2 class="multicolumns-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</h2>
        {% endif %}
        
        {% if text != blank %}
          <p class="multicolumns-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ text }}</p>
        {% endif %}
        
        <div class="multicolumns-items-{{ section.id }}">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% case block.type %}
            {% when "image" %}
            <div class="multicolumns-item-{{ section.id }}">

              {% if numbers %}
                <div class="multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }}">
                  <p>{{ forloop.index }}</p>
                </div>
              {% elsif block.settings.image == blank %}
                <div class="multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }}">
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag: 'placeholder' }}
                 </div>
              {% elsif block.settings.image != blank %}
                <div class="multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }}">
                  <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="multicolumns-item-image-{{ forloop.index }}" {% if lazy %}lazy="loading"{% endif %}>
                </div>
              {% endif %}

              {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                <h3 class="multicolumns-item-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</h3>
              {% endif %}

              {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                <p class="multicolumns-item-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
              {% endif %}
            
              {% if block.settings.link != blank %}
                <a href="{{ block.settings.link_url }}" class="multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.link }}</a>
              {% endif %}
            
            </div>
            {% when "video" %}
            <div class="multicolumns-item-{{ section.id }}">

            {% if numbers %}
                <div class="multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }}">
                  <p>{{ forloop.index }}</p>
                </div>
              {% elsif block.settings.video == blank %}
                <div id="multicolumns-item-video" class="multicolumns-item-video-{{ section.id }}">
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag: 'placeholder' }}
                 </div>
              {% elsif block.settings.video != blank %}
                {% if block.settings.autoplay %}
                  {% assign isMuted = true %}
                {% else %}
                  {% assign isMuted = false %}
                {% endif %}
                <div id="multicolumns-item-video" class="multicolumns-item-video-{{ section.id }}">

                  <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}" playsinline {% if block.settings.autoplay %}autoplay{% endif %} preload="none" {% if block.settings.loop %}loop{% endif %} {% if block.settings.controls %}controls{% endif %} {% if isMuted %}muted{% endif %} class="lazy"></video>
                </div>
              {% endif %}

              {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                <h3 class="multicolumns-item-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</h3>
              {% endif %}

              {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                <p class="multicolumns-item-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
              {% endif %}
            
              {% if block.settings.link != blank %}
                <a href="{{ block.settings.link_url }}" class="multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.link }}</a>
              {% endif %}
            
            </div>
            {% endcase %}
          {% endfor %}
        </div>

        <div class="multicolumns-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="multicolumns-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper" 
              data-slider-view-mobile="{{ slider_view_mobile }}"
              data-column-gap-mobile="{{ column_gap_mobile }}"
              data-column-gap="{{ column_gap }}"
              data-column-row="{{ column_row }}"
              data-column-row-tablet="{{ column_row | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}"
              data-column-row-mobile="{{ column_row_mobile }}"
              data-autoplay="{% if autoplay %}true{% else %}false{% endif %}"
              data-autoplay-speed="{{ autoplay_speed }}"
              data-block-size="{{ section.blocks.size }}">
            <div class="multicolumns-wrapper-{{ section.id }} swiper-wrapper">
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                {% case block.type %}
                {% when "image" %}
                <div class="multicolumns-item-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
    
                  {% if numbers %}
                    <div class="multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }}">
                      <p>{{ forloop.index }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% elsif block.settings.image == blank %}
                    <div class="multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag: 'placeholder' }}
                     </div>
                  {% elsif block.settings.image != blank %}
                    <div class="multicolumns-item-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="multicolumns-item-image-{{ forloop.index }}" {% if lazy %}lazy="loading"{% endif %}>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
    
                  {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                    <h3 class="multicolumns-item-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</h3>
                  {% endif %}
    
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <p class="multicolumns-item-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                
                  {% if block.settings.link != blank %}
                    <a href="{{ block.settings.link_url }}" class="multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.link }}</a>
                  {% endif %}
                
                </div>
                {% when "video" %}
                <div class="multicolumns-item-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
    
                {% if numbers %}
                    <div class="multicolumns-item-number-{{ section.id }}">
                      <p>{{ forloop.index }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% elsif block.settings.video == blank %}
                    <div id="multicolumns-item-video" class="multicolumns-item-video-{{ section.id }}">
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag: 'placeholder' }}
                     </div>
                  {% elsif block.settings.video != blank %}
                    {% if block.settings.autoplay %}
                    {% assign isMuted = true %}
                  {% else %}
                    {% assign isMuted = false %}
                  {% endif %}
                  
                    <div id="multicolumns-item-video" class="multicolumns-item-video-{{ section.id }}">
                      
                      <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}" playsinline {% if block.settings.autoplay %}autoplay{% endif %} preload="none" {% if block.settings.loop %}loop{% endif %} {% if block.settings.controls %}controls{% endif %} {% if isMuted %}muted{% endif %} class="lazy"></video>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
    
                  {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                    <h3 class="multicolumns-item-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</h3>
                  {% endif %}
    
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <p class="multicolumns-item-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                
                  {% if block.settings.link != blank %}
                    <a href="{{ block.settings.link_url }}" class="multicolumns-item-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.link }}</a>
                  {% endif %}
                
                </div>
                {% endcase %}
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="multicolumns-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} swiper-btn-prev">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g id="Left"><path d="M14,17a1,1,0,0,1-.707-.293l-4-4a1,1,0,0,1,0-1.414l4-4a1,1,0,1,1,1.414,1.414L11.414,12l3.293,3.293A1,1,0,0,1,14,17Z"/></g></svg>
        </div>
        <div class="multicolumns-btn-next-{{ section.id }} swiper-btn-next">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g id="Left"><path d="M14,17a1,1,0,0,1-.707-.293l-4-4a1,1,0,0,1,0-1.414l4-4a1,1,0,1,1,1.414,1.414L11.414,12l3.293,3.293A1,1,0,0,1,14,17Z"/></g></svg>
        </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

{% if lazy %}
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>
{% endif %}

{% assign column_row = column_row | plus: 0 %}
{% assign column_row_tablet = column_row | times: 0.5 %}
{% assign column_row_tablet = column_row | round: 0 %}
{% assign column_row_mobile = column_row_mobile | plus: 0 %}

<script>
  function loadSwiper(callback) {
    if (window.Swiper) {
      callback();
    } else {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js";
      script.onload = callback;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
  }
  
  function multicolumnVideoSliderInit(sectionId) {

    {% if lazy %}
      let lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();
    
      window.addEventListener(
        "LazyLoad::Initialized",
        function (event) {
          window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
        },
        false
      );
    {% endif %}
    
    const sliderElement = document.querySelector(`.multicolumns-slider-${sectionId}`);
    if (!sliderElement) return;
    
    const settings = {
      sliderViewMobile: parseFloat(sliderElement.dataset.sliderViewMobile),
      columnGapMobile: parseInt(sliderElement.dataset.columnGapMobile),
      columnGap: parseInt(sliderElement.dataset.columnGap),
      columnRow: parseInt(sliderElement.dataset.columnRow),
      columnRowTablet: parseInt(sliderElement.dataset.columnRowTablet),
      columnRowMobile: parseInt(sliderElement.dataset.columnRowMobile),
      autoplay: sliderElement.dataset.autoplay === 'true',
      autoplaySpeed: parseInt(sliderElement.dataset.autoplaySpeed),
      blockSize: parseInt(sliderElement.dataset.blockSize)
    };

    const sliderConfig = {
      speed: 300,
      watchOverflow: false,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.multicolumns-btn-next-${sectionId}`,
        prevEl: `.multicolumns-btn-prev-${sectionId}`,
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          loop: settings.autoplay && settings.blockSize > settings.columnRowMobile,
          slidesPerView: settings.sliderViewMobile,
          spaceBetween: settings.columnGapMobile
        },
        768: {
          loop: settings.autoplay && settings.blockSize > settings.columnRowTablet,
          slidesPerView: Math.round(settings.columnRow * 0.5),
          spaceBetween: settings.columnGapMobile
        },
        992: {
          loop: settings.autoplay && settings.blockSize > settings.columnRow,
          slidesPerView: settings.columnRow,
          spaceBetween: settings.columnGap
        }
      }
    };

    if (settings.autoplay) {
      sliderConfig.autoplay = {
        delay: settings.autoplaySpeed * 1000
      };
    }

    const slider = new Swiper(sliderElement, sliderConfig);
    
    const videos = document.querySelectorAll(`.section-${sectionId} video`);
    videos.forEach(video => {
      video.setAttribute('controlsList', 'nodownload');
    });

    return slider;
  }

  function initSliders() {
    document.querySelectorAll('[id^="shopify-section-"]').forEach(section => {
      const sectionId = section.id.replace('shopify-section-', '');
      if (section.querySelector(`.multicolumns-slider-${sectionId}`)) {
        loadSwiper(() => multicolumnVideoSliderInit(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }

  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initSliders);
  } else {
    initSliders();
  }

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', (event) => {
      const sectionId = event.detail.sectionId;
      if (event.target.querySelector(`.multicolumns-slider-${sectionId}`)) {
        loadSwiper(() => multicolumnVideoSliderInit(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }
</script>

numbers.label: Use numbers instead of images or video
numbers.description: Use numbers instead of images or video

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
